ygData.subject: Re: Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: This guide was taken from http://www.eqvault.com/guidebook/tradeguide/blacksmithy/blacksmithy3.shtml Item Name          Skill       Required Sheets: Metal bits
ygData.messageBody:
This guide was taken from

http://www.eqvault.com/guidebook/tradeguide/blacksmithy/blacksmithy3.shtml



Item Name Skill Required Sheets:
Metal bits (10)
Files (10)
Steel Boning (40)
Studs (40)
Gorgets (50) (1 sheet)
Bracers (55) (1 sheet)
Boots (55) (1 sheet)
Mask (60) (2 sheets)
Sleeves (60) (2 sheets)
Helm (60) (2 sheets)
Mantle (80) (2 sheets)
Belt (85) (2 sheets)
Leggings (100) (3 sheets)
Tunics (100) (3 sheets)
Cloaks (145+) (3 sheets)


Keep in mind this is just one person's opinions and your results may
vary =)
But this should serve as a pretty good guideline for gettings the most
out of
your smithing skills while putting in the least. Take it easy and I'll
seeya' on Tarew Marr!

Good luck and happy smithing!
Aventyr, Master Blacksmith, Tarew Marr.


I used this guid when I was up to 118 on Rodcet Nife and it seem
accurate.

Tanaman
